description:
6l: remove mention of -e flag

Emitting ELF symbol table is the default behavior now
and cannot be disabled.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=181517df0815 ***

6l: remove mention of -e flag

Emitting ELF symbol table is the default behavior now
and cannot be disabled.

R=golang-dev, iant
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5319050

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

rsc@golang.org writes:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> 6l: remove mention of -e flag
>
> Emitting ELF symbol table is the default behavior now
> and cannot be disabled.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/5319050/
>
> Affected files:
>   M src/cmd/6l/doc.go
>
>
> Index: src/cmd/6l/doc.go
> ===================================================================
> --- a/src/cmd/6l/doc.go
> +++ b/src/cmd/6l/doc.go
> @@ -25,9 +25,6 @@
>  	Elide the dynamic linking header.  With this option, the binary
>  	is statically linked and does not refer to dynld.  Without this option
>  	(the default), the binary's contents are identical but it is
> loaded with dynld.
> --e
> -	Emit an extra ELF-compatible symbol table useful with tools such as
> -	nm, gdb, and oprofile. This option makes the binary file
> considerably larger.
>  -Hdarwin
>  	Write Apple Mach-O binaries (default when $GOOS is darwin)
>  -Hlinux

subject: code review 5319050: 6l: remove mention of -e flag
